channel.title: Offline Village is rising
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Offline Village is rising"

item.title: Offline Village is rising
item.content:encoded:
Offline village has just started off, but we already have some members. We also have quite plenty ryo to buy upgrades, but we need villagers for that. With your help, we can grow fast.

Our village has a friendly attitude and we're willing to help new players with any problems they might get.
